text: Allah -- tini chara an'ya upasya ne'i, -- cirajibanta, sada-bidyamana, tandra tamke abhibhuta karate pare na, nidra'o naya. Tamra'i hacche ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale ebam ya-kichu prthibite. Ke ache ye tamra darabare suparisa karate pare tara anumati chara? Tini janena ki ache tadera samane ebam ki ache tadera pechane; ara tamra jnanera kichu'i tara dharana karate pare na tini ya iccha karena ta byatita. Tamra mahasinhasana mahakasamandali o prthibite byapta; edera ubhayera hephajata tamke klanta kare na, ara tini sarbocce adhisthita, mahamahima.
